attributes.action: Re-open the Sparkhill Pool on time in 2015
attributes.additional_details: We want to open the pool because it Is a local pool and we could go there everyday.We want to open and save our pool and we want the government  to start right now. It is important for us to have a pool because the local community needs a place to keep fit. A pool would give us somewhere fun to play and enjoy ourselves. It could also keep young people out of trouble. We hope this pool will form part of the Government's Olympic Legacy and give our young athletes a place to discover their dreams.

rejection.details: One for  the local authority, not the government
